data.title: Perry's Steakhouse & Grille
data.text:
Rare & Well Done®

What Rare & Well Done® Looks Like

Perry's excels at the unexpected. Our standout style impresses from start to finish with table side carvings and exquisite celebratory touches. Extraordinary service professionals uphold our tradition of excellence, creating a rare experience.

Here, steakhouse mainstays are enhanced to the finest detail. Perry's prime USDA-aged steaks are of unparalleled quality, with exceptional marbling for the best texture. And on our menu, you'll find your favorite additions — from Oscar style to Bacon Marmalade & Bleu to lobster tail halves — for quintessential steakhouse dining that's well done every time.

Discover the Rare & Well Done® Way

A Piece of Perry'sAlthough Perry's Steakhouse locations often have unique design elements, the celebratory cleaver on display is a common thread to remind us of our heritage.

A strong vision and an appreciation of one's roots are necessary to create something great. At Perry's Steakhouse, we celebrate the rich history of our past that has defined our present success. That's why you'll notice the iconic cleaver incorporated into the design of each of our restaurants – in the deli display case, for example.

We ceremoniously chop through each grand opening ribbon with a cleaver to honor our humble beginnings. Think of it as our way of saying thank you to the communities we've served so proudly over the years.
